tool.name: Get TCGA RNAseq data
tool.description: Download Expression data for a cancer type from TCGA
tool.help:
**What it does:**
getRNAseq is a function to download RNAseq data for all samples of a certain cancer type from TCGA. Download all RNA seq level 3 data for the specified disease.
**Input:**
disease A character specifies the disease to download in TCGA such as BLCA,LUAD,LUSC,BRCA etc
**Output:**
RNA seq data in the form of Rdata
